results.content:
I would NOT RECOMMEND IF YOU DO NOT KNOW VUE JS. 

This course has so much potential because of the project but the instructor takes no pride in his work. He is all over the place and constantly makes mistakes. These are not just little mistakes that occur a few times. It happens in almost every video. The worst part about it is that all of these mistakes could have been avoided by re-recording the video but the instructor is obviously too lazy. 

The only reason why I am still in this course is because I already know Vue js so I can deal with the mistakes and catch them before he makes it. On top of that the overall project is great to learn how to make more complicated websites.

I almost guarantee you that anyone who rates this course over 3 stars either has familiarity with Vue js or did not get very far in this course.

results.content:
This was a great lecture.
I tried learning this lecture mainly to learn Firestore and Cloud Functions, so I started in the middle of the lecture.

The lecture covers deploying, so I'm already familiar with beginner-level Vue.js, but I learned a lot. 

If you have already done so, I think this is a lecture you can level up. 

I got the lecture from Japan. Cloud Functions is the version of node If you set the version of function to 10, you will be asked for pay-as-you-go on the way. 

In that case, you can continue the lecture by resetting node to 8 for now. If you want to use Cloud Functions from Japan, please set up your region.
Anyway, it's a great lecture to learn about Firestore, Cloud Functions and Vuex.
Thank you, Filip.

results.content: I was learning a lot about backend development combined with Vue JS. This is a great course with a real project that you learn to program.
results.content_html: I was learning a lot about backend development combined with Vue JS. This is a great course with a real project that you learn to program.

results.content: Amazing project based course. I really enjoyed it and learnt a lot from it. Filip is also very helpful in case you encounter some issue. Before you take this course you should already have at least intermediate knowledge in Vue.js, JS, HTML, CSS  in order to be able to follow along. As a beginner in Firebase I lacked in some cases more detailed explanation on Firebase functions and backend functionality however in general it's a very good course, I recommend it.
